attributes.action: MP’s must debate the damage to our democracy their behaviour has caused.
attributes.additional_details:
MP’s of all political stripes have ignored the clear wishes of their local voters.
As a country no matter how you feel about our current struggles it is essential that a clear message is sent to the PM and all MP’s that the honest hardworking people of this country will not stand for our one connection to those that rule us to be abused as it has been in recent times.
We must join together to make clear that the people of this country expect our votes to be acted upon or our democracy is dead!
attributes.background:
Over the last three years the electorate have seen their once respected vote flagrantly ignored by their own constituency MP’s in an display of sheer arrogance not seen since Cromwell.
For ordinary people to be connected to our systems of government it is essential that their confidence is restored

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

You might like to sign this petition if you would like constituents to be able to recall MPs who they feel are not representing them:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/236800
